column2: Your mercenary band captain [From.GetTitledName] has shown much interest in your [chosen_child.GetSonDaughter] [chosen_child.GetFirstName]. Now [From.GetSheHe] approaches you with a marriage proposal. Any children in such a marriage would be of [From.GetTitledName]'s dynasty.

[From.GetFullName] proposes that we send more troops making them a bigger, better mercenary band. [From.GetSheHeCap] insists that with the experience [From.GetSheHe] has gained, trusting [From.GetHerHim] with a greater force is a natural way of showing mutual respect and trust.
[From.GetFullName] was not happy with your decision to dissolve '[From.GetHerHis]' mercenary band. [From.GetSheHeCap] is reported to have taken your soldiers as [From.GetHerHis] own and disappeared.
Who knows what they will be up to.
Send more supporting troops to increase the size of [From.GetFirstName]'s band.
